div.p: Projected impact of climate change on survival. ( a) Modelled egg to smolt per cent survival based on regression model B ( table 1) for low and high ranched egg proportions for a control period (blue) and two future climate scenarios ( n = 420) (orange, E A2; yellow, H B2) and observed egg to smolt per cent survival for the period 1972–2006; inner area = 95 per cent CI for the median; ( b) egg to smolt per cent survival for low (open circles) and high (closed circles) proportions of ranched eggs for one run based on the E A2 scenario. The area between the two broken lines is the range of observed values from 1972 to 2006.
